uti nifty next 50 index fund.investment_objective: The principal investment objecve of the scheme is to invest in stocks of companies comprising the underlying index and endeavor to achieve return equivalent to underlying index by passive investment. The scheme will be managed by replicang the index in the same weightages in the underlying Index with the intenon of minimizing the performance dierences between the scheme and the underlying Index in capital terms, subject to market liquidity, costs of trading, management expenses and other factors which may cause tracking error. The scheme would alter the scripts/weights as and when the same are altered in the underlying index.
uti nifty next 50 index fund.fund_manager: Mr. Sharwan Kumar Goyal, CFA, MMS Managing the scheme since 02-Jul-2018 & Mr Ayush Jain, Assistant Fund Manager CA, B.Com (Tax) Managing the scheme since May 2022
minimum_investment: a folio is 1000/- and in multiplies of 1/-
